languages.text: "Да. Для проведения комплементат-ритуала требуется активация кровью представителя династии. Все главные протоколы на корабле активируются ключ-кровью".

traits.locale_text: "Да. Для проведения комплиментат-риутала требуется активация кровью представителя династии. Все главные протоколы на корабле активируются ключ-кровью".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Response: affirmative. For the complementa-ritual to take place, activation via the blood of the dynasty is required. All of the ship's high protocols are activated with the key of blood."
languages.original_text: "Да. Для проведения комплементат-ритуала требуется активация кровью представителя династии. Все главные протоколы на корабле активируются ключ-кровью".

traits.locale_text: "Response: affirmative. For the complementa-ritual to take place, activation via the blood of the dynasty is required. All of the ship's high protocols are activated with the key of blood."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Response: affirmative. For the complementa-ritual to take place, activation via the blood of the dynasty is required. All of the ship's high protocols are activated with the key of blood."

traits.locale_text: "Response: affirmative. For the complementa-ritual to take place, activation via the blood of the dynasty is required. All of the ship's high protocols are activated with the key of blood."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「回答：賛成。補足儀式を行うためには、王朝の血統による起動が必要である。全ての船の高等プロトコルは血統というキーにより発動する」
languages.original_text: "Response: affirmative. For the complementa-ritual to take place, activation via the blood of the dynasty is required. All of the ship's high protocols are activated with the key of blood."

traits.locale_text: 「回答：賛成。補足儀式を行うためには、王朝の血統による起動が必要である。全ての船の高等プロトコルは血統というキーにより発動する」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “答复：肯定。重组仪式需要通过王朝的血液进行激活，船上的所有高级程序都是用血液作为钥匙激活的。”
languages.original_text: "Response: affirmative. For the complementa-ritual to take place, activation via the blood of the dynasty is required. All of the ship's high protocols are activated with the key of blood."

traits.locale_text: “答复：肯定。重组仪式需要通过王朝的血液进行激活，船上的所有高级程序都是用血液作为钥匙激活的。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Reaktion: Bestätigung. Damit das Complementa-Ritual stattfinden kann, ist eine Aktivierung mittels des Bluts der Dynastie erforderlich. Alle hohen Protokolle des Schiffs werden durch einen Blutschlüssel aktiviert."
languages.original_text: "Response: affirmative. For the complementa-ritual to take place, activation via the blood of the dynasty is required. All of the ship's high protocols are activated with the key of blood."

traits.locale_text: "Reaktion: Bestätigung. Damit das Complementa-Ritual stattfinden kann, ist eine Aktivierung mittels des Bluts der Dynastie erforderlich. Alle hohen Protokolle des Schiffs werden durch einen Blutschlüssel aktiviert."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Réponse : affirmatif. Le rituel complémentaire nécessite d'être activé par le sang de la dynastie. C'est le cas de tous les protocoles avancés du vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "Response: affirmative. For the complementa-ritual to take place, activation via the blood of the dynasty is required. All of the ship's high protocols are activated with the key of blood."

traits.locale_text: « Réponse : affirmatif. Le rituel complémentaire nécessite d'être activé par le sang de la dynastie. C'est le cas de tous les protocoles avancés du vaisseau. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Respuesta: afirmativa. Para celebrar el complementa-ritual se requiere una activación empleando la sangre dinástica. Todos los protocolos de alta seguridad de la nave se activan con una clave de sangre».
languages.original_text: "Response: affirmative. For the complementa-ritual to take place, activation via the blood of the dynasty is required. All of the ship's high protocols are activated with the key of blood."

traits.locale_text: «Respuesta: afirmativa. Para celebrar el complementa-ritual se requiere una activación empleando la sangre dinástica. Todos los protocolos de alta seguridad de la nave se activan con una clave de sangre».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Cevap: Olumlu. Tümleyici ayinin gerçekleştirilebilmesi için hanedanlığın kanıyla başlatılması gerekiyor. Geminin tüm yüce protokolleri, kan anahtarı vasıtasıyla başlatılır."
languages.original_text: "Response: affirmative. For the complementa-ritual to take place, activation via the blood of the dynasty is required. All of the ship's high protocols are activated with the key of blood."

traits.locale_text: "Cevap: Olumlu. Tümleyici ayinin gerçekleştirilebilmesi için hanedanlığın kanıyla etkinleştirilmesi gerekiyor. Geminin tüm yüce protokolleri, kan anahtarı vasıtasıyla etkinleştirilir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
